about_the_game:
Welcome to an exhilarating journey through the vast expanses of space! In our game, you will assume the role of Sophia, a brave heroine who sets out on a quest to find her lost friend. Her name is Olga, and she vanished without a trace, leading Sophia into a dangerous game of cosmic mysteries.

In a world where populations reside in city-states on different planets, space exploration is a relatively new phenomenon. Sophia must conquer uncharted territories, encounter different races, and explore their unique cultures in her quest to find Olga. To locate her friend, she must decipher the secrets of this world and overcome the perils that await her in the depths of space.

As you progress through the main storyline, you will unravel intriguing hypotheses about Olga's possible whereabouts. Perhaps she embarked on a search for a mysterious planet hidden from all. Solve puzzles, battle enemies, and gather clues to find and rescue Olga.

Your adventure in the cosmic galaxy is only just beginning. Gradually unlock new realms and discover the worlds that lie before you. Become Sophia, a determined heroine willing to do whatever it takes to bring back her friend and unravel the mysteries concealed within the vastness of space.

legal_notice:
End-User License Agreement (EULA) of Astroventure: Unchartred Planet

This End-User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you and Creepy Garden. Our EULA was created by EULA Template for Astroventure: Unchartred Planet.

This EULA agreement governs your acquisition and use of our Astroventure: Unchartred Planet software ("Software") directly from Creepy Garden or indirectly through a Creepy Garden authorized reseller or distributor (a "Reseller").

If you register for a demo of the Astroventure: Unchartred Planet software, this EULA agreement will also govern that demo.

If you are entering into this EULA agreement on behalf of a company or other legal entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind such entity and its affiliates to these terms and conditions. If you do not have such authority or if you do not agree with the terms and conditions of this EULA agreement, do not install or use the Software, and you must not accept this EULA agreement.

This EULA agreement shall apply only to the Software supplied by Creepy Garden herewith regardless of whether other software is referred to or described herein. The terms also apply to any Creepy Garden updates, supplements, Internet-based services, and support services for the Software, unless other terms accompany those items on delivery. If so, those terms apply.
License Grant

Creepy Garden hereby grants you a personal, non-transferable, non-exclusive licence to use the Astroventure: Unchartred Planet software on your devices in accordance with the terms of this EULA agreement.

You are permitted to load the Astroventure: Unchartred Planet software (for example a PC, laptop, mobile or tablet) under your control. You are responsible for ensuring your device meets the minimum requirements of the Astroventure: Unchartred Planet software.

You are not permitted to:

- Edit, alter, modify, adapt, translate or otherwise change the whole or any part of the Software nor permit the whole or any part of the Software to be combined with or become incorporated in any other software, nor decompile, disassemble or reverse engineer the Software or attempt to do any such things
- Reproduce, copy, distribute, resell or otherwise use the Software for any commercial purpose
- Allow any third party to use the Software on behalf of or for the benefit of any third party
- Use the Software in any way which breaches any applicable local, national or international law
- use the Software for any purpose that Creepy Garden considers is a breach of this EULA agreement

Intellectual Property and Ownership

Creepy Garden shall at all times retain ownership of the Software as originally downloaded by you and all subsequent downloads of the Software by you. The Software (and the copyright, and other intellectual property rights of whatever nature in the Software, including any modifications made thereto) are and shall remain the property of Creepy Garden.

Creepy Garden reserves the right to grant licences to use the Software to third parties.
Termination

This EULA agreement is effective from the date you first use the Software and shall continue until terminated. You may terminate it at any time upon written notice to Creepy Garden.

It will also terminate immediately if you fail to comply with any term of this EULA agreement. Upon such termination, the licenses granted by this EULA agreement will immediately terminate and you agree to stop all access and use of the Software. The provisions that by their nature continue and survive will survive any termination of this EULA agreement.
Governing Law

This EULA agreement, and any dispute arising out of or in connection with this EULA agreement, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of me.
name: Astroventure: Unchartred Planet Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5850
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 280X

short_description: Embark on a cosmic journey as Sophia, a brave heroine searching for her lost friend Olga. Explore uncharted worlds, encounter diverse races, and unravel cosmic mysteries. Will you find Olga amidst the depths of space? Battle enemies, solve puzzles, and unlock new realms in this captivating adventure
